page.title: 09CHILDRENS GAMES
page.content: In our survey we found the children played a wide variety of games, from the traditional hide_and_seek to the modern Darth Vaders.Each game has its own season.The most popular games are Tig,Bulldog, Birthdays and Hopscotch. This is how you play Birthdays. More than nine people are needed.Someone is chosen to be it. When it calls the month of your birthday you must run across the playground.If you are touched you must join IT and help tig people too,if whole year is called everyone must run.To play Bulldog you need ten players.Choose 'IT'Everyone else runs from one circle to another.If you are pushed onto your back you are 'it'too. Soon everyone will be it.So start again.
